Dungeon Saga: Grobowiec Króla Krasnoludów

boardgame.description: Over a thousand years ago, Valandor, the greatest known hero fell in battle, fighting to protect the lives of those around him. From shore to shore, all owe thanks to his wondrous legacy. Now, sacred sites across the land have been defiled and plundered by the disgraced wizard Mortibris, who along with his vile undead minions will stop at nothing to obtain the secrets of Valandor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s power. Only the bravest heroes dare oppose him. Thrown together from the far corners of the realm, they step boldly into the depths, ready to face whatever foul evil awaits them_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hero, your quest begins here!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Embark on a fantasy adventure for up to five players with Dungeon Saga: Dwarf King's Quest. With highly detailed game-pieces and learn-as-you-play rules, this set contains everything you need to transform your tabletop into a deep and immersive world of heroes and monsters. Play a single game in just 30 minutes, or combine the carefully composed adventures for countless hours of classic quest gameplay. When the fate of the world hangs in the balance, which part will you play in the epic Dungeon Saga?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;nbsp;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Epic, story-driven campaign_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Classic quest atmosphere_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Easy rules you can learn as you play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Characters that develop as the adventure unfolds_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Beautifully illustrated 3D dungeons with doors, barrels, bookcases and more!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-26 detailed and fully assembled miniatures in coloured plastic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Evocative _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;ancient tome_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; packaging in a protective sleeve_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One player takes the part of the evil dungeon overlord with the forces of evil at his command, and the others divide the mighty heroes between them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;nbsp;Each hero has strengths and weaknesses and teamwork is the key: The mighty barbarian can slaughter many foes at a time, yet he is lightly armoured and vulnerable to strong enemies. The Dwarf, on the other hand, is steadier as his thick armour can resist most attacks. The Elf is not as skilled a fighter as either of these, instead preferring to stay at a distance where her finely-honed archery skills can best be used. Finally, there is the wizard -the others may laugh at his lack of fighting skill, yet it is often his magic that carries the day. If the others can keep him alive, that is._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This core set will be supported with a raft of expansion products as time goes on, adding new challenges and game modes to your Dungeon Saga. The first of these will be Adventurer's Companion which will add an AI system for solo and fully co-operative play, the ability to create unique characters from scratch using any model in your collection, the tools you need to design your own dungeons and much more!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The game should be shipping fairly soon and I will try to get it shipped directly to you so you can get it ASAP, otherwise I will charge shipping at whatever the cost to ship is. Dungeon Saga – Dungeon Master Pledge with 4 Expansions, all unlocks and Kickstarter exclusives Breakdown BASE SET - 8-Page Step-by-step Quick Start guide 24-Page Dungeon Saga Rulebook 32-Page Dungeon Saga Quest Book Orlaf the Barbarian Rordin the Dwarf Fighter Madriga the Elven Ranger Danor the Human Wizard Mortibris the Necromancer Elshara the Elven Banshee Grund the Undead Dwarf King Hoggar the Undead Zombie Troll Shaman 4 Skeleton Warriors 4 Zombies 2 Skeleton Archers 2 Basilean Armoured Zombies 2 Ghosts 2 Dwarf Revenants 2 Zombie Trolls 33 double-sided Dungeon Room and Corridor Tiles made of thick card. 50 clear plastic clips to hold your dungeon together 10 plastic Dungeon Doors 22 pieces of plastic Dungeon furniture 12 D6 Dice Overlord cards Lots of tokens Overlord Panel ADVENTURERS COMPANION - 1 96-page softback Adventurer’s Companion 1 Character Sheet Pad More tokens Over 250 cards, including: 13 Overlord Command Cards 29 Major Spell Cards 33 Minor Spell Cards 6 Song Cards 59 Magic Item Cards 10 Trap Cards 13 Location Cards TO VISIT BETWEEN SCENARIOS 24 Event Cards 24 Invisible Overlord Cards SOLO PLAY 40 Uncharted Dungeon Cards DELVING INTO THE UNKNOWN You can even play as villains battling against the Hero’s. …….And many more cards……. The Return of Valendor Expansion - Valendor miniature Bael undead demon lord miniature 3 skeletons, 3 zombies 1 ghost 1 zombie troll 1 undead dwarf revenant. New Tiles More Cards Warlord of Galahir Expansion - Rules and Scenarios Warlord Panel Cards Tiles 2 trolls 2 mawbeast 4 goblin warriors 2 goblin archers 2 orc morax 2 orc greatax 2 orc skulks 2 orcling stands 1 Thrundak Infernal Crypts Expansion - Rules and Scenarios Warlord Panel Cards Tiles 6 lower abyssal 2 abyssal warriors 2 molochs 2 tortured souls 2 succubi 2 hellhounds 1 drechnok 2 effrits The Tyrant of Halpi- Rules and Scenarios Warlord Panel Cards Tiles Couple of doors and barrels and chests. 1 Dragon Green Rage Booster Pack - 3 goblins 1 orclings 1 mawbeast 3 orcs 1 troll champion. Denizens of the Abyss Booster Pack - 3 lower abyssals 1 succubus 1 moloch 1 effrit 1 abyssal warrior 1 hellhoud 1 tortured soul. Kickstarter Exclusive Dungeon Journal – This includes up to date rules for mantics previous game ‘dwarfs king hold’ with extra scenarios etc. Kickstarter Exclusive Art Print 9 Extra miniatures /hero_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s s(including 3 Kickstarter Exclusives) Blaine (exclusive is a hero buy only used for certain scenarios in the dungeon journal therefore he doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t.have a character sheet but his stats are in the dungeon journale, Logan (exclusive), Hordin _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Gnasher (exclusive), Kapoka, Arianya, Ally, Ibrahim, Venetia, Hratth. THE HERO CHARACTER SHEETS INCLUDED. Kickstarter Exclusive Resin Miniature - Keldan PLEASE NOT – KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVES WILL BE NEVER SEEN AT RETAIL. DELIVERY UK - £10.00 Includes insurance and Tracking DELIVERY EU – PLEASE SEND ME A MESSAGE WITH FULL ADDRESS AND THEN I CAN GET AN ESTIMATE.

Not played with. Ive punched some tokens out and looked through the cards and done a component count. Heres what you get Dungeon saga Dungeon Master Pledge with EXTRAS!!! More detailed breakdown Dungeon Saga Base Set • 8-Page Step-by-step Quick Start guide • 24-Page Dungeon Saga Rulebook • 32-Page Dungeon Saga Quest Book 26 Battle-ready Coloured Plastic Miniatures – no assembly required! • Orlaf the Barbarian • Rordin the Dwarf Fighter • Madriga the Elven Ranger • Danor the Human Wizard • Mortibris the Necromancer • Elshara the Elven Banshee • Grund the Undead Dwarf King • Hoggar the Undead Zombie Troll Shaman • 4 Skeleton Warriors in two different poses • 4 Zombies in two different poses • 2 Skeleton Archers • 2 Basilean Armoured Zombies • 2 Ghosts • 2 Dwarf Revenants • 2 Zombie Trolls A Fully Interactive 3D Dungeon: • 33 double-sided Dungeon Room and Corridor Tiles made of thick card. • 50 clear plastic clips to hold your dungeon together 10 plastic Dungeon Doors: • 6 Small Doors • 2 Small Portcullises • 2 Double Doors 22 pieces of plastic Dungeon furniture, including: • 4 Treasure Chests with Lids • 4 Barrels • 2 Tables • 1 Bookcase • 1 Sorcerer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cabinet • 1 Well • 1 Lectern with Book • 1 Throne • 1 Tomb • 1 Weapon Rack Adventurers Companion (A4 Paperback) • 8 double-sided Character Cards for your heroes and villains • 1 Overlord Panel for the Necromancer player • 6 Bone-coloured Overlord dice • 6 Blue-coloured Hero Dice • 22 Overlord Command Cards • 9 Minor Spell Cards • 12 Major Spell Cards • 27 Magic Item Cards • 8 Ability Cards • 1 Long Range Ruler • 1 Short Range Ruler • 24 Wound Counters • 4 Hero Counters • 24 Piles of Bones • 6 Weak Point Counters • 1 Cave In Counters • 3 Petty Magic Spell Effect Counters • 1 Geomancy Spell Effect Counter • 1 Sorcery Spell Effect Counter • 4 Necromancy Spell Effect Counters • 1 You are in my Power Counter • 16 Experience Counters • 1 Banshee Heart in 4 Pieces • 15 Door Counters • 1 Adventurer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Companion Magic Book box • 1 96-page softback Adventurer’s Companion • 1 Character Sheet Pad • Over 250 cards, including: • 13 Overlord Command Cards • 29 Major Spell Cards • 33 Minor Spell Cards • 6 Song Cards • 59 Magic Item Cards • 10 Trap Cards • 13 Location Cards • 24 Event Cards • 24 Invisible Overlord Cards • 40 Uncharted Dungeon Cards • 20 Wound Counters • 16 Experience Counters • 4 Hero Counters • 12 Pile of Bones Counters • 3 Druidism Spell Effect Counters • 6 Divinity Spell Effect Counters • 3 Pyromancy Spell Effect Counters • 3 Aeromancy Spell Effect Counters • 3 Hydromancy Spell Effect Counters • 2 Geomancy Spell Effect Counters • 2 Sorcery Spell Effect Counters • 2 Song Effect Counters • 3 Poison Dart Trap Counters • 3 Deadfall Trap Counters • 3 Sticky Trap Counters • 3 Cage Trap Counters • 3 Poison Needle Counters • 3 Choking Gas Counters • 3 Mushroom Spore Counters • 3 Dart Trap Counters • 3 Slicing Blade Trap Counters • 3 Pit Trap Counters • 8 Blank Trap Counters • 15 Door Counters Kickstarter Exclusive Dungeon Journal (A5 paper back) Kickstarter Exclusive Art Print Evil dead booster pack 3 skeletons, 3 zombies 1 ghost 1 zombie troll 1 undead dwarf revenant. 9 Extra Heros (including 3 Kickstarter Exclusives) Kickstarter Exclusive Resin Miniature (Keldan) The Return of Valandor Expansion - valendor miniature - bael undead demon lord mini. - Tiles - Rules and scenarios - Cards The EXTRAS are below Kickstarter exclusive Resin Health and Skeleton Bone piles Black Fortress Tile Pack £7.50 shipping to the UK If your in the EU please message me with your full address and I will get an exact amount for postage.

****This is a PRE-ORDER**** Delivery Expected in December, 2015. This listing is for everything include in the Dungeon Master Pledge plus the following add-ons ONLY: The Warlord of Galahir Infernal Crypts Tyrant of Halpi Black Fortress Dungeon Tiles and Furniture Pack (scenarios in the Dungeon Journal were written specifically for this set) Because I ordered the three expansion packs (WoG, IC, and ToH), this listing comes with a second _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Magic Book_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; box to store the expansions. See Kickstarter Update #69 - href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1744629938/dungeon-saga-the-dwarf-kings-quest/posts/1185891_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1744629938/dungeon-saga..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The base Dungeon Master pledge includes too much to list everything here, but the following KS Exclusives are included: Dungeon Journal (24+ Scenarios and Missions, Rules for KS Exclusive Characters, Unholy Crusades Abyssal Campaign, Green Tide Orc Campaign, Black Fortress, and more) Keldan - resin mini Hordin and Gnasher - plastic minis Logan - plastic mini Blaine - plastic mini Art Print I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know what the final shipping weight of this lot will be, but I estimate it will be at least 10 pounds - and likely more. I take great care with the items I ship, but because of the size and value of this listing, I am requiring the buyer to pay for insurance during shipping. Please consider this when deciding whether to buy this lot. Please contact me if you have any questions. I want the buyer to know exactly what is included in case anything is unclear, and be 100% comfortable with purchasing this lot.

Base Pledge $100 Warlord of Galahir expansion $25 Infernal Crypts expansion $25 Tyrant of Halpi expansion $25 Halls of Dolgarth $25 Legendary Heroes of Dolgarth Resin Minis Addon $25 Legendary Heroes of Mantic Resin Minis Addon $15 Legendary Heroes of Renown Resin Minis Addon $25 Dungeon Furniture Addon $15 3D Dungeon Doors Addon $5 Hero Dice Addon $10 DM Dice Addon $10 Resin Counter Upgrade Addon $10 Acrylic Counter Upgrade Addon $15 Dungeon Bases Addon (10 25 x 25mm) $8 Total $338

This is for a Kickstarter edition of Dungeon Saga. Core gameplay is good but I purchased it for the solo rules which I found lacking compared to other games I already owned. The game and expansions have been opened and played a few times. Tiles are punched and everything has been sorted and bagged. In order to fit everything in the boxes, I have mixed card decks and tiles together. Anyone looking to keep everything separate when storing will have some sorting to do. But, everything is accounted for and all bent miniatures have been straightened. This lot includes: Dungeon Saga: Dwarf King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Quest Warlord of Galahir expansion Infernal Crypts expansion Tyrant of Halpi expansion Hardcover Adventurers Companion (book has page reference typos and is being reprinted by Mantic) and card decks Black Fortress tiles and furniture set Kickstarter exclusive heroes and dungeon journal If interested I will include epic versions of 8 of the dungeon saga heroes (wizard, barbarian, ranger, dwarf, paladin, cleric, thief and salamander). Be warned, they are resin miniatures and I have assembled them already. They are very fragile and at risk of breaking when shipped. I will send them them if buyer is interested, but wanted to provide fair warning and have not included them in my overall valuation of the lot. Buyer will pay actual shipping costs. Expect a heavy package (approx. 15 lbs.).

Fresh from the recent Kickstarter campaign, this is the full Dungeon Master pledge level from Dungeon Saga: The Dwarf King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Quest. The game is still sealed, as is the bag of extra parts, and the box containing the rest of the stretch goals from the Kickstarter campaign. *** reserved for user: Markus Blut KS-Version; plus: - Warlord of Galahir - Infernal Crypts - Tyrant of Halpi - Black Fortress - Dungeon Traps - Acrylic Counter Upgrade Note: The pictures over at the KS page are NOT what Mantic decided to finally produce / deliver nor are all of the promised goals produced. I will send everything electronically to you given you provide a valid e-mail-address or Dropbox - account IF IT EVER BECOMES AVAILABLE !!!!! (Adventures, Scenarios aso). If not that be so and is not my responsibility. The game is unplayed but inspected and punched. The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Companion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is as delivered, no replacements were made. As far as I could see (there are various lists (sadly not always agreeing with one-another) about what should have been in the box, the one from Mantic I base my inspection on is sadly very _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;short_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) the game is complete, all minis are be there. One resin (?) mini (a stretch goal) has no base (no replacement was made) but this should be easy to fix in using bases from Tabletop gaming. IMPORTANT: This package is huge and will be sold in the original KS-Pack. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to cover the minis better than I received them. Nevertheless some minis are bend and have to be fixed (hot water - see BGG for tips on how to do it). So shipping is expensive: Expect between 17 to 22 € in the main-EU, extra for the outskirts or islands; oversea (US, Asia etc.) will be at least 4 times that. Shipping will be checked at the local postal-office when sale is confirmed and you only pay what I have to pay for shipping. Shipping only with DHL (German Post), insured up to 500 €. If the package gets lost I will refund you as soon as I get the money from DHL except shipping costs (they are not refunding these, dunno why). One obvious note: Please make sure you give me the correct shipping address (yes, it seems to happen that people don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know where they live) - packages returned to me will have extra fees and will be send again ONLY if you pay these fees AND the additional shipping costs. Payment: bank-transfer (Europe only) or PayPal (+ 3 % fees in addition / 5 % + (depending on country) for oversea / non-EU) By buying you agree that you have read all of the points made above and accepted the terms of this sale.
